description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

背景介绍：

“比起真相，更多的时候，是谎言让世界的关系变的平和。很多情况下，谎言会缝合暂时的矛盾，会缓解人内心的不安和惶恐。因为真相的残酷和不便，所以大部分人想避开真相。传达真相，一直是让人痛苦的事情，所以我偶尔会在真相面前闭上眼睛。”
——某人正在追的一部剧


最近，众多的社会负面新闻占据着人们的视线，瓜贩之死，婴儿之死，各种贪污腐败……面对这些“真相”，你选择刻意地回避，还是早已麻木，抑或愤怒斥责之后立即转入另一个娱乐八卦？或者你也会像王文志记者（who?）一样，选择将更多“真相”揭露，以求问题得到解决？

话题：

面对越来越多的“真相”，面对世界并没有你想象的那么美好的“真相”，你会选择如何看待、对待它们？

范例1：

Referring to the truth, on no account can we ignore another truth that although new media can expose plenty of facts to us, what we have seen is still a drop in the ocean and more facts will be buried forever. It is human nature to expect and find truth; it is also human nature to fear and evade truth. In a way, I quite understand how those people feel, for this all-too-common response also applies to me perfectly. For a long time, I dare not open some websites to browse the social news and resign myself to addicting to all kinds of recreations.

However, I still choose to face up to facts, because truth brings ephemeral pain to us while lie brings eternal pain. Lies blind you with specious peace, which only leads to a fairly narrow outlook on life. It is the posture to facts not truth itself that makes a difference. Were there no truth, never would we talk about solving problems. As said by Lu Xun, “True warriors dare to look squarely to the gloomy life and are bold in facing up to the dripping blood.” The positive way to react to truth is to use it as a chance for growth. Not easy as it is, it’s a useful way to deal with an inevitable part of life.

范例2：

Recently, one may think that China is turning ugly as an astonishing number of scandals are appearing. In fact, a lot of social problems have long existed and only until recently have these “real facts” been exposed by enthusiastic journalists or citizens, which indeed does good to the social morality transformation. To have the facts revealed is the first step achieved to save social conscience. To bring the morality transformation to the next level, ordinary citizens should take outcry into action, so as to destroy corruption and protect their own rights. Before they react, they should make sure the fact they see is “truth”. Then publicize the scandal, condemn the evil and defend the innocent, through social network or media. To pursue truth through endless effort should be of everyone’s responsibility and duty.

范例3：

Recently, we have witnessed piles of negative news from television, newspaper and the Internet, such as, the corruptions of senior officials, the sudden death of an infant and so on, which surprised the public and undoubtedly caused wide public anger. It is said by many that truth is what we speak highly of, however, people suffer a lot when facing those truths. Isn't it ironic? Personally speaking, the relationship between the truth and the lie is very tricky. In some circumstances, the lie is far better than the truth because lying can mitigate the conflict to some extent, whereas telling the truth would unfortunately intensify it, which is the last thing we want to see. Actually, nothing is absolute in the complex world. What matters is the balance between revealing the truth and covering the lie, which is the so-called the golden mean.

范例4：

To us suburban creatures, reality seems to be less attractive in the violent contrast with lie. However, no matter how cruel the reality is, no matter how sweet the lies are, we should not quench a thirst with poison – replacing reality with lie.
Admittedly, lies lead us to a world full of charming and beautiful illusions, where we can temporarily forget all the worries and sadness with abandon. But gradually the world brings invisible fences, making us sheep merely expecting grass and water, completely forgetting the vast prairie. Finally, it is the advent of the death, asking for our skin and fur, that reminds us of the life we have lived. It is just like the story told by the heated anime Attack on Titan – the high walls give us human beings protection from man-eating titans, but it is the broken of them that let us have an opportunity to live a real and legendary life, and to see the vastness of the sea, the eruption of the volcano, and the brilliance of the polar lights, etc. – the real world we are living.
Reality may be sad and disappointing, but that is why we should face it, to change it, to make it better, and this is one of the greatest meanings in our life.

SUMMARY：

困扰美国多年的儿童肥胖率终于下降

CONTENT：

The researchers cannot be certain about what is driving obesity rates downward. However, the US has made several important changes in healthand nutrition policy in the past few years. Most notably, the government's main nutrition-assistance programme for children now provides better access tofruits, vegetables and whole grains instead of high-fat dairy foods, and many childcare providers now give children more physical activity and less passivesitting.
"Clearly, the good news out of this study isthat these interventions are beginning to pay some dividends," says Richard Hamburg, deputy director of the Trust for America's Health, a nonprofit disease-prevention organization based in Washington DC.

研究者尚不确定肥胖率下降的原因。然而过去几年，美国在健康和营养政策方面的确做出了一些重大改变，首当其冲的就是政府提供的主要营养援助项目。该项目让孩子们更多的食用水果蔬菜、全谷物类食品，减少高脂奶制品的摄入。很多儿童保育机构现在也为孩子们提供更多的体育活动，让他们减少久坐。

对于究竟是什么使肥胖率下降，研究者并不确定。然而，在过去几年，美国的确在有关健康和营养的政策上做了几项重要的变革。最令人瞩目的是，现在政府为孩子们提供的主要营养补助项目，更倾向于水果，蔬菜和所有的谷物的补助而不是高脂肪含量的垃圾食品。而且现今许多儿童保育员带孩子们进行更多的体育锻炼，减少他们坐着的时间。
美国健康信托是一个旨在预防疾病的非盈利性组织，总部设在华盛顿。其副总监理查德翰伯格说：“很明显，这项研究带来的好消息就是，政府的干预开始给人们带来了好处”。
